LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.label: ironwood logs
LanguageData.VG_IronWoodLog.description: Raw wood from an ironwood tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Ironwood is a very durable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_Apple.label: applewood logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Apple.description: Raw wood from an apple tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Applewood is a nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_Cherry.label: cherrywood logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Cherry.description: Raw wood from a cherry tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Cherrywood is a moderate to nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_DatePalm.label: date palm logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_DatePalm.description: Raw wood from a date palm tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Date palm is a durable wood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_Fig.label: figwood logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Fig.description: Raw wood from a fig tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Figwood is a low to nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_Orange.label: orangewood logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Orange.description: Raw wood from an orange tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Orangewood is a perishable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_Peach.label: peachwood logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Peach.description: Raw wood from a peach tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Peachwood is a low to nondurable hardwood.
LanguageData.WoodLog_Coconut.label: red palm logs
LanguageData.WoodLog_Coconut.description: Raw wood from a red palm tree. When processed it becomes useful for building structures, weapons, and even simple prosthetics. Red palm is a durable wood.
